Mary-Ann,

Can't thank you enough for translating the Hokkaido Arc intervie=
w... 
I'm quite devastated that it didn't push through... It would've been =

so cool to see Shinpachi and Soujirou as main characters, but most of 
all=

said Sa=
itou was in Hokkaido... *cries* I wonder how Watsuki would've 
portrayed Sh=
inpachi, his relationship with Saitou and all that 
goodness. 

I can't bel=
ieve he chose to deviate from writing historical manga... 
I mean yeah it's=
 been discussed before and many times that the his 
following mangas were n=
ot "par" with RK. Didn't he for once think 
that "I will be the King of His=
torical Manga". Why oh why did he 
stopped...

~wounds
